commandobject.name: SetEmoticon
commandobject.documentation: Sets the emoticon for current bot.

property.name: CenterSize
property.documentation: Sets the center emoticon size. 0 will disable the emoticon.

property.name: LeftSize
property.documentation: Sets the left emoticon size. 0 will disable the emoticon.

property.name: RightSize
property.documentation: Sets the right emoticon size. 0 will disable the emoticon.

property.name: BubbleType
property.documentation: Sets the bubble type behind the emoticons.

property.name: BubbleSize
property.documentation: Sets the bubble size behind the emoticons. 0 for no bubble.

property.name: Time
property.documentation: Fade out of the emoticons in seconds.
